Articles.Content:
Hey guys o/

Finally checking in after having played KSP for a long while now.

Been playing around with MODs a lot recently (despite Curses best efforts) and have registered on the forum finally to say hi, and to weigh in here and there.

Looking to start a play-with-me blog as I have an imminent 6 month deployment coming up, so I needed a project :3

Look forward to hearing from you guys o/
Welcome Crashy McSplodey! Welcome to the forums!

Thanks guys

Been derping around with my install, hit the RAM limit earlier so I have been balancing the MOD load for now, going to be looking at putting in the x64 modification so I can get the last few in.

There really are som excellent and beautiful mods out there, looking at a list of ~30 once I get them all installed.

Does anyone have an opinion on the life support mods please, I was looking at the modular resourses and station science earlier, which seem to go hand in hand, and hoping that the compatible TAC expansion comes out soon, but this is one aspect which I currently have not got in my install.

Derping around on kerbin at the moment trying to accumulate enough science to unlock the tier III techs (45sci), gotta get those solar panels so I can get a comm network up and running!
